parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: LogId
parameters.description: The ID of the log monitoring metric.

parameters.name: MetricExpress
parameters.description:
The extended field. The extended field allows you to perform basic operations on the aggregation results.

For example, if you have calculated TotalNumber and 5XXNumber by aggregating the data. TotalNumber indicates the total number of HTTP requests, and 5XXNumber indicates the number of HTTP requests whose status code is greater than 499. You can calculate the server error rate by adding the following formula to the extended field: 5XXNumber/TotalNumber\*100.

JSON format: {"extend":{"errorPercent":"5XXNumber/TotalNumber\*100"}}. Description:

*   extend: required.
*   errorPercent: the alias of the field generated in the calculation result. You can specify the alias as needed.
*   5XXNumber/TotalNumber\*100: the calculation expression.

parameters.name: MetricName
parameters.description: The name of the metric. For more information about the metrics for cloud services, see [Appendix 1: Metrics](~~163515~~).

parameters.name: SlsLogstore
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service Logstore.

parameters.name: SlsProject
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project.

parameters.name: SlsRegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the Log Service project resides.

parameters.name: Tumblingwindows
parameters.description: The size of the tumbling window for calculation. Unit: seconds. CloudMonitor performs aggregation for each tumbling window.

parameters.name: ValueFilterRelation
parameters.description:
The logical operator that is used between log filter conditions. Valid values:

*   and
*   or

>  The ValueFilterRelation and `ValueFilter.N.Key` parameters must be used in pair.
